title: Best of The Program | Guests: Sen. Tom Cotton & Daniel Horowitz | 6/23/21
description:
Senate Republicans shut down the For the People Act, and Sen. Tom Cotton joins to discuss what it would have done. Whistleblowers are opening up about critical race theory indoctrination in the military. Parents across the nation are standing up against CRT to school boards, and Loudoun County, VA, is becoming a hot spot. Conservative Review podcast host Daniel Horowitz shares how he’s being censored on social media for talking about ivermectin and COVID-19, despite recent studies supporting its use.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
